column4: my Ubuntu 11.04 install (alongside Win 7) hangs at the screen where they ask "where are you?"
I made a mistake. My aplogies.
my Ubuntu 11.04 install (alongside Win 7) hangs at the screen where they ask "where are you?"... any idea?
You need to select a representative entry for your time zone.
i can not. niether does the select work, nor can I type in that screen
So something in the install process went seriously wrong. The only thing I can advise it to start the installation process anew.
If the second install process stops unexpectedly again, then try to install Ubuntu a third time and now without a graphical user interface.
does not solve is no exact description. Thus I cannot help you.
sorry. I tried again and it stalls in the same screen everytime
So try to install Ubuntu without installing a GUI.
was looking at these bug reports: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bug/772415
That man wrote: "Today I tried again but this time DISCONECTING THE NETWORK, and voila!. It let me choose the right TimeZone and carry on with the installing process." You could try this also.
Yes. Let me try that. Have to reboot :-(
